Address: 545 PROMENADE DU CENTROPOLIS SUITE 100, LAVAL, H7T 0A3, Canada
CompanyDescription: Neptune specializes in the extraction, purification, and formulation of cannabis products and provides customized turnkey solutions and specialty ingredients for the nutrition industry. Through its wholly owned subsidiary 9354­7537 Québec Inc., Neptune is licensed by Health Canada to process cannabis at its 50,000 square foot facility located in Sherbrooke, Quebec. Neptune brings decades of experience in the natural products sector to the legal cannabis industry. Leveraging its scientific and technological expertise, Neptune focuses on the development of value-added and differentiated products for the Canadian and global cannabis markets. Neptune's activities also include the development and commercialization of turnkey nutrition solutions and patented ingredients such as MaxSimil®, and of a variety of marine and seed oils. Its head office is located in Laval, Quebec.  ... More ...
